title: Malmalling Vineyard Rebrand
summary: A modern, heritage‑aware rebrand for a boutique vineyard—spanning label design, motion identity, and launch assets.
problem: The legacy brand lacked consistency across packaging and digital touchpoints. Seasonal label variants drifted apart and diluted recognition.
solution: We developed a cohesive visual system with modular typography and a restrained color palette. Motion elements mirror the brand's landscape lines.
